t: Publisher: Roaring Brook Press, A Division Of Holtzbrinck Publishing Holdings Lp, New York, NY, United States - Publishing company profile | PublishersGlobal.com
s: Founded in 2001, Roaring Brook, an innovative publisher of high quality children's books publishes about sixty titles a year, half picture books and half novels for middle grade and young adult readers. In 2006, Roaring Brook launched First Second, an imprint devoted to graphic novels.

t: Roaring Brook Press - Publisher Contact Information
